truths: Move blue circle block B2 inside SA1.
Place the block B2 to special area SA1
Push B2 into SA1, then reverse back towards SA2
Put block B2 in special area SA1.
cot:
The ground truth goals all describe the action of moving block B2 to a specific location, SA1. The predicted goal also describes the action of moving block B2 to SA1. Despite slight variations in wording, such as "inside," "to," "into," and "in," all descriptions are consistent in the outcome they describe: block B2 should end up in SA1.

The only additional detail in one of the ground truth goals is the instruction to "reverse back towards SA2" after pushing B2 into SA1. However, this action does not change the outcome related to the position of block B2; it only specifies an additional action for the robot after the block has been placed.

Since the predicted goal matches the outcome of all the ground truth goals, which is to have block B2 in SA1, the predicted goal is correct. The additional reversing instruction does not affect the correctness of the predicted goal in terms of the final position of block B2.

The similarity level is (2) Correct.
